item.title: Tesla Robotaxi Reports 3 Crashes In Austin On July 1, Details Hidden
item.description: One of the crashes was with a static object with minor injuries and the Tesla towed away. And a 4th crash was not reported. This does not look good.

item.title: Fat Bear Week Roars Into View So Fans Can Vote For Favorite Fatties
item.description: Brown bears are fattening up on salmon to survive winter hibernation at Katmai National Park & Preserve in Alaska. Voting runs September 23-30, 2025.
